description:
Data acquired 9-4-16 and 10-30-16 at Atoka, OK
Scope: William Optics GT81 w/ 0.8x reducer (382mm focal length at f/4.7)
Mount: Orion Sirius EQ-G
Guidescope: Orion 50mm guidescope
Guiding camera: StarShoot Autoguider
Imaging camera: Canon t3i (unmodified)

ISO800
44x480" lights (5hr 52min total integration time)
16x darks
60x flats
200x bias

Processing Details:

PixInsight:
Batch PreProcessing
Drizzle Integration
Dynamic Crop
DBE
Background Neutralization
Color Calibration
MLT for noise reduction
Histogram Transformation
Split L and RGB

Processing of RGB:
PixInsight:
SCNR green
Small histogram stretch
Photoshop:
Match Color used for saturation with a lightness mask

Processing of L:
PixInsight:
MMT with starmask to reduce small stars (x2)
MT to reduce larger stars (x3)
HDR Multiscale Transform on entire image
Histogram Transformation
Photoshop:
Curves adjustment
Unsharp Mask using a lightness mask

Combination of L and RGB in Photoshop using luminance layer blending

PixInsight:
ACDNR
Histogram Transformation
Resampled to 50%
title: M45 - The Pleiades
